author: Kejal Vyas
title: After Talks With Opposition Collapse, Venezuela Sets Presidential Vote
text:
Venezuela will hold presidential elections on April 22, the government said Wednesday, defying a growing roster of countries in the region that have panned the vote as a sham to bolster President Nicolás Maduro’s autocratic rule.

The announcement came just hours after talks between the government and the opposition to defuse the oil-rich country’s crisis collapsed and as U.S. Secretary of State Rex Tillerson was wrapping up a six-day Latin America tour. Mr. Tillerson has been working to gather support to increase pressure...
